description.value: The warmth and light of the sun gives you life. If you rest outdoors for 10 minutes during the day, you regain Hit Points equal to your [[/r (floor(@actor.level/2)*@actor.con.mod)[Healing]]]{Constitution modifier Ã— half your level}. You gain this benefit in addition to any healing from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Treat Wounds].
